title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags - 13 Gallon, 50 Count, Unscented**

Keep your kitchen clean and garbage in check with the reliable Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Designed with everyday convenience and durability in mind, these trash bags are an essential addition to your household cleaning supplies.

**Key Features:**

- **Capacity**: Generous 13-gallon size, perfect for standard tall kitchen trash bins.
- **Quantity**: Each package contains 50 trash bags, ensuring a long-lasting supply.
- **Material**: Made from tear-resistant white plastic, these bags are built to withstand heavy loads without ripping or leaking.
- **Strength**: Flex-tra strength provides peace of mind, as the bags are designed to hold up to the demands of kitchen waste.
- **Closure Type**: Each bag features a red drawstring closure, making it easy to tie up and carry the trash out without any messes or spills.
- **Scent**: Unscented, ideal for those who prefer a clean, fragrance-free experience.
- **Color**: The classic white color keeps contents discreet and maintains a neat appearance.
- **Alexa Voice Shopping**: For added convenience, you can reorder these trash bags using Alexa Voice Shopping. Just ask Alexa to place an order for you, and never run out of trash bags again.

Whether you are tossing away kitchen scraps, cleaning up after a gathering, or just need a sturdy bag to handle your household waste, Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags are up to the task. With their advanced tear resistance and easy-to-use drawstring, managing your trash has never been easier. Add these to your kitchen, and experience the strength and convenience of Flextra trash bags.
